lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Porter Robinson
[00:01.000] 作词 : Porter Robinson
[00:34.670]Well, you were the aftermath Of every judgment
[00:43.472]So cold by the sweat that
[00:47.589]You’ll waste away
[00:52.030]And you carry your enemies
[00:56.361]But they’re so familiar
[01:00.692]I’m sick of the company
[01:04.811]So I cull the shame
[01:07.975]And I know you’ll say how I’m a burden
[01:11.623]Yeah, do your worst, all at once
[01:16.278]I know what you want from me (from me)
[01:20.507]I know what you’re thinking
[01:24.944]And it’s not the voice of all the others
[01:29.224]You’ve only said it to yourself
[01:33.427]I know what you want from me (from me)
[01:37.610]I know what you’re thinking
[01:39.708]They come to feel like things we’re saying to ourselves
[01:43.744]An inch from my ears again:
[01:47.858]“You should be sorry,”
[01:52.158]“A better song could fix my problems”
[02:00.608]I’m tired of your questioning
[02:04.501]You’re cut down too easily
[02:08.776]And I don’t know what’s good for me
[02:13.281]I can’t decide
[02:16.408]And I know you’ll say how I’m a burden
[02:20.227]Yeah, do your worst, all at once
[02:24.645]I know what you want from me (from me)
[02:29.150]I know what you’re thinking
[02:33.446]And though they sound like one another
[02:37.674]You’ve only said it to yourself
[02:42.009]I know what you want from me (from me)
[02:46.192]I know what you’re thinking
[02:48.369]“Now these voices have become our own.”
[03:09.587]An inch from my ears again:
[03:13.706]“You should be sorry,”
[03:17.824]A solemn man:
[03:20.038]“A better song could fix my problems”
[03:25.907]I’m tired of your questioning
[03:30.400]You’re cut down too easily
[03:34.492]And I don’t know what’s good for me
[03:38.872]I can’t decide
[03:42.122]And I know you’ll say how I’m a burden
[03:46.156]Yeah, do your worst, all at once
[03:50.556]I know what you want from me (from me)
[03:54.626]I know what you’re thinking
[03:59.271]And though they sound like one another
[04:03.520]You’ve only said it to yourself
[04:07.610]I know what you want from me (from me)
[04:11.889]I know what you’re thinking
[04:18.500]And I know you’ll say how I’m a burden
[04:22.442]Yeah, do your worst, all at once
[04:26.935]I know what you want from me (from me)
[04:31.177]I know what you’re thinking
[04:35.649]And though they sound like one another
[04:39.766]You’ve only said it to yourself
[04:44.083]I know what you want from me (from me)
[04:48.567]I know what you’re thinking
[04:54.091]Sometimes, the inner voice is encouraging:
[04:56.860]Calling for you to run those final few yards;
[04:59.459]You’re nearly there, keep going, keep going, keep going, keep going.
[05:03.208]It will all be OK in the end.
[05:05.723]
tlyric:
[by:NickyRomero]
[00:34.670]好吧 他人的评头论足使你伤痕累累
[00:43.472]时常冒着冷汗
[00:47.589]使你日渐消瘦
[00:52.030]你与敌为友
[00:56.361]但他们你再熟悉不过了
[01:00.692]我早已厌倦了陪伴
[01:04.811]所以我放下了面子
[01:07.975]我知道你会说我是个累赘
[01:11.623]那就索性一次骂个够吧
[01:16.278]我知道你想从我这获取什么
[01:20.507]我知道你在想什么
[01:24.944] 但那并非他人的声音
[01:29.224]你只是在自言自语
[01:33.427]我知道你想从我这获取什么
[01:37.610]我知道你在想什么
[01:39.708]慢慢地就好像在自说自话
[01:43.744]再次对我耳语道：
[01:47.858]“你应该感到抱歉。”
[01:52.158]“一首好歌就可以治愈我的全部。”
[02:00.608]我受够了你的质疑
[02:04.501]你太容易被击倒
[02:08.776]我不知道到底怎样对我有好处
[02:13.281]我很难抉择
[02:16.408]我知道你会说我是个累赘
[02:20.227]那就索性一次骂个够吧
[02:24.645]我知道你想从我这获取什么
[02:29.150]我知道你在想什么
[02:33.446]尽管他们的话听起来都差不多
[02:37.674]你只是在自言自语
[02:42.009]我知道你想从我这获取什么
[02:46.192]我知道你在想什么
[02:48.369]“现在这些靡靡之音已经与我们融为一体了。”
[03:09.587]再次对我耳语道：
[03:13.706]“你应该感到抱歉。”
[03:17.824]有人庄重地说过：
[03:20.038]“一首好歌就可以治愈我的全部。”
[03:25.907]我受够了你的质疑
[03:30.400]你太容易被击倒
[03:34.492]我不知道到底怎样对我有好处
[03:38.872]我很难抉择
[03:42.122]我知道你会说我是个累赘
[03:46.156]那就索性一次骂个够吧
[03:50.556]我知道你想从我这获取什么
[03:54.626]我知道你在想什么
[03:59.271]尽管他们的话听起来都差不多
[04:03.520]你只是在自言自语
[04:07.610]我知道你想从我这获取什么
[04:11.889]我知道你在想什么
[04:18.500]我知道你会说我是个累赘
[04:22.442]那就索性一次骂个够吧
[04:26.935]我知道你想从我这获取什么
[04:31.177]我知道你在想什么
[04:35.649]尽管他们的话听起来都差不多
[04:39.766]你只是在自言自语
[04:44.083]我知道你想从我这获取什么
[04:48.567]我知道你在想什么
[04:54.091]有时，内心的声音鼓舞着你
[04:56.860]它呼唤你跑完最后几步路
[04:59.459]就快到终点了，继续向前，奋勇向前
[05:03.208]最终，一切都会好起来的
